sen.j: 寺社側が犯罪者と結託してかばうような行為が明白な場合、寺社奉行によって厳しく取り調べられ、僧侶・神官を捕縛する事もあった。
sen.e: When a temple or a shrine protected a criminal, Jisha-bugyo investigated it strictly and sometimes captures the temple or the shrine.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: When a temple or a shrine protected a criminal, Jisha-bugyo investigated it strictly and sometimes captured the temple or shrine.
sen.cmt: slight modification
sen.e: When a temple or a shrine protected a criminal, Jisha-bugyo investigated it strictly and sometimes took the priests into custody.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 寺社地が治外法権になる様な事はことはあり得ない。
sen.e: Therefore, a temple or a shrine was not extraterritorial place.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Therefore, a temple or a shrine was not an extraterritorial place.
sen.cmt: slight modification
sen.e: Therefore, a temple or a shrine was not immune from the law.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。
